alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Holmes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 24 at 9:10PM CDT until March 24 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN HOLMES AND WESTERN CARROLL COUNTIES... At 910 PM CDT, a confirmed large and extremely dangerous tornado was located near Black Hawk, moving northeast at 55 mph. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. TAKE COVER NOW! HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...You are in a life-threatening situation. Flying debris may be deadly to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be destroyed. Considerable damage to homes, businesses, and vehicles is likely and complete destruction is possible. The tornado will be near... Emory around 915 PM CDT. Coila around 920 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Carrollton. TORNADO...OBSERVED TORNADO DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
